summary: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of El príncipe y la corista (1957).
cast: Michelle Williams|Eddie Redmayne|Julia Ormond|Kenneth Branagh|Pip Torrens|Geraldine Somerville|Michael Kitchen|Miranda Raison|Karl Moffatt|Simon Russell Beale|Toby Jones|Robert Portal|Philip Jackson|Jim Carter|Victor McGuire|Dougray Scott|Richard Attlee|Michael Hobbs|Brooks Livermore|Rod O'Grady|Dominic Cooper|Richard Clifford|Judi Dench|Zoë Wanamaker|Emma Watson|Gerard Horan|Alex Lowe|Georgie Glen|Richard Shelton|Peter Wight|Paul Herzberg|James Clay|Des McAleer|Derek Jacobi|Jem Wall|Ben Sando|Josh Morris|David Rintoul|Penny Ryder|Sean van der Wilt|Adam Perry|Peter Agnelli|Eric Coco|Steve Conway|Luc Eden|Tony Honickberg|Martin John King|Steve Paice|Martin Poole

title: Mi semana con Marilyn
